name: Click or Swim
description:
This is not a normal cruise to your vacation destination. On this voyage you have to try to save yourself from the cold threatening water.

Try to beat your high score!

This is a clicker game I made for my study game development, and now publish for your gaming pleasure.

I am very curious about your reactions. If you like what I do and if you can spare it during these tough times, please consider a donation. So that I can continue with game development.

I hope you enjoy!
